name: Nike Air Max 270
description: The Nike Air Max 270 delivers visible air under every step. Updated for modern comfort, it pays homage to the original 1991 Air Max 180 with an exaggerated tongue top and heritage logo.

name: Nike Air Max 90
description: The Nike Air Max 90 stays true to its OG roots with its iconic Waffle outsole, stitched overlays and classic, color-accented TPU plates. Retro colors celebrate the first generation while Max Air cushioning adds comfort to your journey.

name: Adidas Superstar
description: The Adidas Superstar is a classic sneaker that never goes out of style. With its iconic shell toe and three stripes design, it's a must-have for any sneakerhead.

name: Converse Chuck Taylor
description: The Converse Chuck Taylor is a timeless classic that never goes out of style. With its canvas upper and rubber sole, it's perfect for everyday wear.

name: Vans Old Skool
description: The Vans Old Skool is a classic skate shoe that's perfect for kids. With its durable canvas upper and signature waffle outsole, it's built to withstand the demands of skateboarding.

name: Ray-Ban Aviator
description: The Ray-Ban Aviator is a timeless classic that never goes out of style. With its iconic teardrop shape and metal frame, it's a must-have for any fashion enthusiast.

name: Puma Suede Classic
description: The Puma Suede Classic is a stylish and versatile sneaker. With its suede upper and rubber sole, it offers both comfort and durability.

name: Reebok Classic Leather
description: The Reebok Classic Leather is a timeless sneaker that combines style and comfort. With its leather upper and cushioned insole, it's perfect for everyday wear.

name: Adidas Stan Smith
description: The Adidas Stan Smith is a classic tennis shoe that's perfect for kids. With its leather upper and rubber outsole, it provides both style and traction.

name: Gucci Belt
description: The Gucci Belt is a luxury accessory that adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. With its iconic GG logo and leather construction, it's a statement piece.
